item.title: Carpet Stain Solution
item.description: A simple solution I’ve used on almost any carpet stain for fast professional quality results! So, quite a number of years ago my girlfriend (now wife) and I had an apartment together in a historical district of town. We started with basically nothing. The floors were hardwood and so we purchased some rugs for the living and bedroom areas. My girlfriend had brought her white-fabric couches from her apartment when she moved in.
